extracurricular.英释: extracurricular activities are not part of the course that a student is doing at a school or college

confrontational.英释: If you describe the way that someone behaves as confrontational, you are showing your disapproval of the fact that they are aggressive and likely to cause an argument or dispute

straightforward.英释: honest about your feelings or opinions and not hiding anything

experimentation.英释: the process of performing scientific tests to find out if a particular idea is true or to obtain more information

dissatisfaction.英释: a feeling of not being satisfied
